short_summary: The Canada Border Service Agency (CBSA) has an immediate requirement for purchase and delivery 6 video probes with associated business and technical requirements
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation must be submitted by 2023-03-21 at 14:00 EDT. Marylanders and non-resident workers must make their preferred filing option selection for the 2023 individual tax return filing season by March 2, 2023, by using Form 8948 to indicate a move and requesting an automatic 6-month extension of time to file the 2023 return or by marking Form 1040 as amended.
